title: AdaMoE: Token-Adaptive Routing with Null Experts for Mixture-of-Experts Language Models
details: Z Zeng, Y Miao, H Gao, H Zhang, Z Deng - arXiv preprint arXiv:2406.13233, 2024
abstract: Mixture of experts (MoE) has become the standard for constructing production-level large language models (LLMs) due to its promise to boost model capacity without causing significant overheads. Nevertheless, existing MoE methods usually enforce …
